abstract: NHL Roundup; Philadelphia Flyers defeat Arizona Coyotes, 4-2; other hockey scores and news noted.

headline.print_headline: Flyers Stay Hot in Their Captain’s Return
headline.main: Flyers Stay Hot in Claude Giroux’s Return

snippet: Giroux scored one of Philadelphia’s three first-period goals, and Mark Streit had three assists to lead the Flyers to a 4-2 victory at home over the Arizona Coyotes on Saturday.
lead_paragraph: Giroux scored one of Philadelphia’s three first-period goals, and Mark Streit had three assists to lead the Flyers to a 4-2 victory at home over the Arizona Coyotes on Saturday.
